remarks: Deduction version of ~ strfv .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.)
statement:
strfvd.e $e |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) $.
strfvd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
strfvd.f $e |- ( ph -> Fun S ) $.
strfvd.n $e |- ( ph -> <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. S ) $.
strfvd $p |- ( ph -> C = ( E ` S ) ) $.
